metadata.title: Establish organoid system with eCas9 and Cre recombinase

params.note: Human embryonic stem cell (hES cell) line expressing enhanced specificity SpCas9 (eCas9) with upstream loxp stop element used for CRISPR perturbations.
Lentiviral vector engineered to deliver 4-hydroxytamoxifen-inducible CRE recombinase and dual single-guide RNA (sgRNA) cassette for eCas9 induction.
